post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body:
[](/tavireally)Not just horrible, but weird different.
I woke up weak and tired. Everything hurts, [my palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SW-BU6keEUw), and I was throwing up nonstop a few minutes ago. My head hurts, more than hearts really. I feel like something is majorly wrong. I stayed home from school today, which is bad because I will miss a lot, but I know that what I have is contagious because I got it from my mom.
Last time I felt like this I had to go to the hospital.
So, how are you doing this fine morning?

post.author: TheGreatAndPowerful1
post.body:
>how are you doing this fine morning?
More like evening here. I'm just really tired, that's all. I felt a bit sick yesterday, but a few pills fixed that.

post.author: Morichalion
post.body: Go get looked at.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body:
[](/octaviayes)I took these pills for this, but now I'm extremely sweaty. I don't know what this is, and I still feel like sleeping.
Yah, I forget not everyone is of this timezone.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/catavia)I'm the only one in the house at the current moment and I doubt I can make it all the way to the hospital a mile-ish away.

post.author: Dragon__
post.body:
[](/ladyhugsawake)Hope it gets better.
My day has been fine so far, hopefully it continues to be so.
Hope you're doing well otherwise my old friend/enemy/nemesis.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body:
[](/octyawn)Thanks.
My head has started throbbing and now I'm sweatier than before. God something is wrong here.
I'll just distract myself with Plounge and homework.

post.author: mercurated
post.body: I'm somehow both really tired and really energetic at the same time. Part of me wants to get up and go for a run, and another part of me just wants to lay down and go to sleep. It's weird and uncomfortable.

post.author: Ootachiful
post.body:
[](/lyricorn)Go to the hospital.
Or if you want to hear it in the language of love, gehen Sie zum Krankenhaus.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/pokertavi)The only solution is to sleep-run.

post.author: Dragon__
post.body: [](/eevn) I'll help with that distraction!

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/wutavia)I'd say it'd be best to, but I doubt I can walk a mile-ish to the nearest hospital. So I'll wait it out and see.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/tavidrool)

post.author: Quaanth
post.body: [](/ppstrut) I'm feeling awfully happy today, would you mind insulting me?

post.author: Morichalion
post.body: Call someone and let them know what's up.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/taviyay)Your mother was a hamster and your father smells of elderberries.

post.author: Quaanth
post.body: [](/seriouspie) Me, not my family.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body:
[](/taviskeptical)I haven't owned phone since the 6th grade, and that one broke after a week.
I'm on my own here.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/taviuwot)You smell funny.

post.author: Quaanth
post.body: [](/ppthumbsup) You did it!

post.author: Engineer5816
post.body: Good. I've been coughin' and a hackin' pretty bad for about a week now.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/taviwtf)I just coughed blood.

post.author: akronymus
post.body: Shoot a mail to someone?

post.author: Engineer5816
post.body: oh. u might wanna get that checked out, it might be Pneumonia/bronchitis

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/wutavia)Get it checked. Ain't nobody got time for that.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/wutavia)What?

post.author: mercurated
post.body: I can sleep *walk*, but I'm not sure about sleep *running*.

post.author: akronymus
post.body: Send a email to a friend that then can phone for someone to bring you into a clinic

post.author: Dragon__
post.body: [](/seductivecadance)Do you require more, my dear?

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/whyhellothere)Not with that attitude.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/taviwut)It may not be the smartest decision, but I'll wait it out. If it gets bad enough, I'll call, but at this point it's not bad enough for that yet.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/maaaaaaaybe)

post.author: akronymus
post.body: I hope it won't get too bad. Good luck.

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/blushyocty)Thanks.

post.author: Engineer5816
post.body: k. Hope u gets better.

post.author: Dragon__
post.body: [](/pwettyflank)Well I've never been one to say no...

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/socktavia)

post.author: Dragon__
post.body: [](/cadancesmirk)Now I'm intrigued by what you might have in store.

post.author: PotatOSLament
post.body:
Well, I spent Friday with a lovely stomach flu passed on from an early Thanksgiving on Tuesday. Spent it sleeping and/or on the toilet with my face in a trashcan. Never actually threw up, but it wasn't a fun day. I've gotten better though. On this particular fine morning, I'm doing laundry and dishes that I was too lazy to do over the weekend, and chatting with you, Fonso.
Edit: Looking at some of your other responses to people, you might have to wait out what you're going through until someone gets home, but you should really go to a hospital if you're coughing blood. That's not something that' normally "goes away on its own".

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/yeswordy)

post.author: FonsoTheWhitesican
post.body: [](/taviworry)Probably, but for the moment, yes, I will have to wait it out. It seems to have peaked now, as in not getting even worse, so that's good.

post.author: tesselode
post.body: Sleeping really isn't a bad idea when you're sick.

post.author: tesselode
post.body: Get well!

post.author: Sargon-the-great
post.body: I'm probably sick, but i still walked 7 minutes to school in -30° weather.
